# Alarm.Schedule.Relative

**Structure**

An object that describes when an alarm alerts, relative to the device’s timezone.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Relative
```

## Creating a scheduled alarm

- **init(time:repeats:)**: Creates an alarm that alerts at a specific **time.**
- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Time**: An object that describes the hour and minute at which an alarm alerts.

## Describing an alarm

- **repeats**: The cadence at which the alarm repeats, if any.
- **time**: The hour and minute at which the alarm alerts, relative to the device’s current timezone.
- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence**: Describes the cadence at which an alarm will repeat, if any.

## Setting an alarm schedule

- **Alarm.Schedule.fixed(_:)**: A one-shot alarm that fires at a specific time, not a time relative to the current time zone.
- **Alarm.Schedule.relative(_:)**: An alarm that can repeat and fire at a time relative to the device’s current time zone.
